name: IDs Please
description:
We've created a game that is heavily inspired by "Papers Please" on Unity3D game engine for a game jam. Unfortunately, due to real-life problems we couldn't finish it on time. Anyone who is interested can use it as a foundation for this type of a game project.

All of the 2D assets are our own work. Character portraits are created by emirshn.

github: https://github.com/cantrkr/Papers-Please_Unity
